thread.title: Rep. Ross holding town hall in Clermont - Orlando Sentinel
thread.title_full: Rep. Ross holding town hall in Clermont - Orlando Sentinel

author: Steven Lemongello
title: Rep. Ross holding town hall in Clermont - Orlando Sentinel
text:
Rep. Ross holding town hall in Clermont U.S. Rep. Dennis Ross U.S. Rep. Dennis Ross U.S. Rep. Dennis Ross (Orlando Sentinel) Steven Lemongello is planning to hold a town hall meeting today in Clermont , one of several congressional town halls scheduled during the congressional winter break.
The town hall held by Ross, R-Lakeland, is scheduled for 5:30 p.m. at the Clermont City Center. 
U.S. Rep. Dan Webster , R-Clermont, has town halls scheduled for Inverness in Citrus County at noon Tuesday, Minneola on Thursday and The Villages on Friday. U.S. Rep. Stephanie Murphy has one scheduled for Oviedo on Friday. 
Recent town halls around the country have featured vocal opposition to Republican plans to repeal Obamacare, essentially the reverse of anti-Obamacare protesters who packed Democratic town halls in 2009. 
U.S. Rep. Ron DeSantis , R- Palm Coast, held a telephone town hall last week, while Democratic U.S .Rep. Darren Soto of Orlando held a town hall Saturday. 
U.S. Marco Rubio, whose office in downtown Orlando saw protests for the fifth of six straight Tuesdays, has not scheduled a town hall. A postal workers union has since scheduled a “empty chair” town hall, without Rubio, in Tampa on Wednesday. 
slemongello@orlandosentinel.com, 407-418-5920 or @stevelemongello Caption GOP lawmakers who gambled on Trump now worried 
Republican leaders in Congress wonder if their agenda priorities will be overshadowed by White House revelations. 
Republican leaders in Congress wonder if their agenda priorities will be overshadowed by White House revelations. Caption Trump to nominate Oklahoma Atty. Gen. Scott Pruitt to head the Environmental Protection Agency 
President-elect Donald Trump is expected to nominate Oklahoma Atty. Gen. Scott Pruitt to head the Environmental Protection Agency. Here is some background information on Pruitt. (Dec. 7, 2016)
